Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Placenta Diseases/Abruptio Placentae

Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Reproductive System Disorder/Female Reproductive System Disorder/Placenta Disorder/Placental Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Premature Separation of Placenta
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Premature separation of the normally implanted PLACENTA from the UTERUS. Signs of varying degree of severity include UTERINE BLEEDING, uterine MUSCLE HYPERTONIA, and FETAL DISTRESS or FETAL DEATH.
